Sentencas: YSZ thin films (YSZTFs) with controlled structure and morphology are desirable for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Bias voltage dependent structure and morphology evolution of magnetron sputtered YSZ thin film: a basic insight

Sentencas: We report for the first time the bias voltage (40 V and 120 V) dependent structural and morphological evolution of YSZ thin films grown via radio frequency magnetron sputtering (RFMS) technique.
Titulo: Bias voltage dependent structure and morphology evolution of magnetron sputtered YSZ thin film: a basic insight

Sentencas: The optimum sample was annealed at 600 degrees C to achieve an improved ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Bias voltage dependent structure and morphology evolution of magnetron sputtered YSZ thin film: a basic insight

Sentencas: As-prepared YSZTFs were characterized using various analytical tools.
Titulo: Bias voltage dependent structure and morphology evolution of magnetron sputtered YSZ thin film: a basic insight

Sentencas: Glancing angle x-ray diffraction (GAXRD) pattern of YSZTFs revealed the existence of non-columnar structure (cubic phases) with preferred growth along [200] lattice orientation.
Titulo: Bias voltage dependent structure and morphology evolution of magnetron sputtered YSZ thin film: a basic insight

Sentencas: YSZTFs grown at 120 V displayed good homogeneity and uniformity (100 nm thick and crystallite size in the range of 10-12 nm) accompanied by large microstrain along [111] lattice orientation.
Titulo: Bias voltage dependent structure and morphology evolution of magnetron sputtered YSZ thin film: a basic insight

Sentencas: The bias voltage dependent alterations in the morphology of YSZTFs (grain compactness, size, shape, distribution and surface roughness) were clearly manifested in the FESEM and AFM images.
Titulo: Bias voltage dependent structure and morphology evolution of magnetron sputtered YSZ thin film: a basic insight

Sentencas: Raman and FTIR spectra of YSZTFs disclosed the formation of tetragonal and cubic phases.
Titulo: Bias voltage dependent structure and morphology evolution of magnetron sputtered YSZ thin film: a basic insight

Sentencas: An in-depth data analyses suggested the successful incorporation of Yttria into the zirconia lattice.
Titulo: Bias voltage dependent structure and morphology evolution of magnetron sputtered YSZ thin film: a basic insight

Sentencas: Annealed film exhibited improved polycrystallinity and evolved morphology.
Titulo: Bias voltage dependent structure and morphology evolution of magnetron sputtered YSZ thin film: a basic insight

Sentencas: These achieved YSZTFs could be effective electrolyte for low temperature SOFC operation.
Titulo: Bias voltage dependent structure and morphology evolution of magnetron sputtered YSZ thin film: a basic insight
